summary: This is an email exchange from August 10, 2019, regarding a discrepancy in inmate count slips at a Bureau of Prisons facility, specifically questioning why the count changed from 73 to 72 between midnight and 3 AM. The email includes an attachment of the requested information.

persons.name: Indiaye
persons.context: Appears as the sender of the original email providing attached count slip information in response to a request.

events.title: Inmate Count Discrepancy Inquiry
events.description: An email is sent questioning why the inmate count at a Bureau of Prisons facility changed from 73 to 72 between 12 AM and 3 AM on August 10, 2019.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain from August 10, 2019, concerning inmate count slips at a Bureau of Prisons facility.
A specific discrepancy is noted: the inmate count changed from 73 to 72 between 12 AM and 3 AM.
The email includes an attachment labeled 'IENI.hun' containing the requested count slip information.
The correspondence suggests internal monitoring or audit procedures regarding inmate population counts.
